input.sentences: it was the day of the big performance and the actors were eager to arrive on time .
in the audience both family members and friends alike held cameras to catch their loved ones on stage .
during the intermission | the actors were able to interact with their loved ones over drinks and snacks .
during the performance | one particular touching scene involved a monologue .
towards the end of the performance | many of the actors were in the same scene together | and it was a very touching one .
output.sentences: I'm on my way to my schools' play.
Mike is going to be the photographer.
Here's me and my boyfriend holding on to each other.
The rest of the cast are waiting on the stage for the performance to begin.
My scene is a litle later, I hope I give a good performance.
